text: On 22 March 2019, a man drove a car into pedestrians in Zaoyang, Hubei, China, killing six people. Police shot him dead. The driver was later identified 44-year-old Cui Lidong who was known to police as a previous offender. He is said to have carried daggers in his car at the time. == References == Category:2019 crimes in China Category:2019 road incidents Category:2010s murders in China Category:2010s road incidents in Asia Category:21st-century mass murder in China Category:History of Hubei Category:March 2019 crimes in Asia Category:March 2019 events in China Category:Mass murder in 2019 Category:Vehicular rampage in China Category:Xiangyang
title: Zaoyang car attack
